# helpers.is_prime { #pyLHD.helpers.is_prime }

`helpers.is_prime(n)`

Determine if a number is prime

## Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description   | Default    |
|--------|--------|---------------|------------|
| `n`    | int    | Any integer   | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type   | Description                                            |
|--------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| bool   | [logical]: True if n is prime, False if n is not prime |
